title: Championship ashe border
body:
If I get the border will it be available even if I don't have championship ashe skin? 
Will I be able to ** use it in future** if I buy the championship ashe skin? 
Cause I don't  have championship ashe skin right now.

replies.body: The Championship Ashe border is designed for Championship Ashe, so it will not be shown on other skins. You'll still be able to use it once you do have the skin though.
